# SNEHA-SAURABHA Event Registration Website

## Project Overview
Mobile-first event registration website with Kalparuksha amber-gold theme.

## Project Setup Completed (2025-10-28)

- [x] Mobile-first HTML/CSS/JS project structure created
- [x] Kalparuksha amber-gold theme implemented
- [x] Single-screen no-scroll flow for all pages
- [x] Git repository initialized and linked to GitHub
- [x] All registration screens completed:
  - Event banner with register button
  - Registration type selection (Individual/Couple/Group)
  - Personal details form
  - Review page
  - Payment screen
  - Success/Failure acknowledgment

## Tech Stack
- Pure HTML5
- CSS3 (Modern features, mobile-optimized)
- Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+)
- No dependencies required

## Key Features
- Fixed viewport (no scrolling, no flicker)
- Bright amber-gold color scheme
- Touch-optimized interactions
- Real-time form validation
- Smooth screen transitions
- Landscape mode support

## Next Steps
1. Upload event banner image to replace placeholder
2. Push to GitHub: `git push -u origin main`
3. Test on actual mobile devices
4. Add backend integration for form submission (if needed)
5. Integrate payment gateway (if needed)

## Running the Project
Open `index.html` in a browser or use Live Server extension in VS Code.
